name: Chamberlain of the Six Samurai
desc: The Six Samurai are supported from the shadows by this silent and mysterious warrior. His past is unknown to them, but his countless scars are proof of his experience.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Cunning of the Six Samurai
desc: Send 1 face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control to the Graveyard, then target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Dark Hole
desc: Destroy all monsters on the field.

name: Double-Edged Sword Technique
desc: Target 2 "Six Samurai" monsters in your GY; Special Summon those targets in Attack Position. During the End Phase of this turn, destroy them, and if you do, take damage equal to those destroyed monsters' ATK.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Elder of the Six Samurai
desc: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

name: Enishi, Shien's Chancellor
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster; destroy that target. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Fiendish Chain
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Effect Monster on the field; negate the effects of that face-up monster while it is on the field, also that face-up monster cannot attack. When it is destroyed, destroy this card.

card_sets.set_name: Saga of Blue-Eyes White Dragon Structure Deck

name: Future Samurai
desc:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
● Once per turn: You can banish 1 monster from your Graveyard to target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy that target.

name: Gateway of the Six
desc:
Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 Bushido Counters on this card. You can remove Bushido Counters from your field to activate these effects.
● 2 Counters: Target 1 "Six Samurai" or "Shien" Effect Monster; that target gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.
● 4 Counters: Add 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand.
● 6 Counters: Target 1 "Shien" Effect Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Grandmaster of the Six Samurai
desc: You can only control 1 "Grandmaster of the Six Samurai". If you control a "Six Samurai" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in your GY; add that target to your hand.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
Strike of Neos Sneak Peek Participation Card

name: Great Shogun Shien
desc: If you control 2 or more face-up "Six Samurai" monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Your opponent can only activate 1 Spell/Trap Card each turn. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy a face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Hand of the Six Samurai
desc: If you control another "Six Samurai" monster: You can Tribute 1 "Six Samurai" monster, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

name: Legendary Six Samurai - Enishi
desc: Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can banish 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your Graveyard to target 1 face-up monster on the field; return that target to the hand. You must control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. While you control 2 or more face-up "Six Samurai" monsters except "Legendary Six Samurai - Enishi", this card gains 500 ATK and DEF.

name: Legendary Six Samurai - Kageki
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Six Samurai" monster from your hand. While you control a "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, this card gains 1500 ATK.

name: Legendary Six Samurai - Kizan
desc: If you control a "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). While you control 2 or more other "Six Samurai" monsters, this card gains 300 ATK and DEF.

name: Musakani Magatama
desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, that destroys a card(s), while you control a "Six Samurai" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

name: Reinforcement of the Army
desc: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.

name: Return of the Six Samurai
desc: Target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. Destroy it during the End Phase of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: Rivalry of Warlords
desc: Each player can only control 1 Type of monster. Send all other face-up monsters they control to the GY.

name: Shadow of the Six Samurai - Shien
desc:
2 Level 4 "Six Samurai" monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "Six Samurai" monster you control with less than 2000 ATK; its original ATK becomes 2000 until the end of this turn.

name: Shien's Advisor
desc: If this card is Normal Summoned while you control a "Six Samurai" monster: Declare 1 Monster Type; while this card is face-up on the field, monsters with the declared Monster Type cannot declare an attack or be Special Summoned.

name: Shien's Daredevil
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Bushido Counter on it (max. 1). This card gains 300 ATK while it has a Bushido Counter on it. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Bushido Counter on; remove 1 Bushido Counter from this card, then place it on that target.

name: Shien's Dojo
desc: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Bushido Counter on this card. You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" or "Shien" Effect Monster from your Main Deck, whose Level is less than or equal to the number of Bushido Counters on this card.

name: Shien's Footsoldier
desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck.

name: Shien's Scheme
desc: If a "Six Samurai" monster you control is destroyed by battle: Special Summon up to 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your hand.

name: Shien's Smoke Signal
desc: Add 1 Level 3 or lower "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck to your hand.

name: Shien's Squire
desc: During damage calculation, in either player's turn, if a "Six Samurai" monster you control battles: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; that monster cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

name: Six Samurai United
desc: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Bushido Counter on this card (max. 2). You can send this card to the GY; draw 1 card for each Bushido Counter on this card.

name: Six Strike - Thunder Blast
desc:
Remove 1 Bushido Counter from your side of the field to activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.
● Target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

name: Six Style - Dual Wield
desc: If the only monster you control is 1 "Six Samurai" monster in face-up Attack Position: Target 2 cards your opponent controls; return those targets to the hand.

name: Spirit of the Six Samurai
desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position. While equipped by this effect, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK and DEF. If the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Draw 1 card. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.)

name: Temple of the Six
desc: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Bushido Counter on this card. Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for each Bushido Counter on this card.

name: The A. Forces
desc: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK for each Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster you control.

name: The Immortal Bushi
desc: While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a Warrior-Type monster. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard and all the monsters in your Graveyard are Warrior-Type: You can Special Summon this card. You must also control no monsters to activate and to resolve this effect.

name: The Six Samurai - Irou
desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. You must control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Six Samurai - Kamon
desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card; destroy that target. You must control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. This card cannot declare an attack during the turn this effect is activated. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Six Samurai - Nisashi
desc: While you control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Six Samurai - Yaichi
desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Set Spell/Trap Card; destroy that target. You must control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. This card cannot declare an attack during the turn this effect is activated. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Six Samurai - Yariza
desc: While you control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, this card can attack your opponent directly. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Six Samurai - Zanji
desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: Destroy the monster this card attacked. You must control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

name: The Warrior Returning Alive
desc: Target 1 Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.
